website_summaries.verdict: Emerging from the low-priced range of Adidas tennis footgear, the GameCourt gets the nod of recreational players looking for an A-grade practice shoe. Its bootie-like mesh structure keeps the weight very light, allowing users to sprint comfortably across the court. It’s also braced with a thermoplastic coating for upper reinforcement, making it suitable on different court setups.
pros: Plenty of owners say this shoe provides a substantial amount of cushioning
According to many wearers, its herringbone tread offers adequate hold on both clay and hard courts
As described by a considerable sum of users, the soft mesh cover makes it extremely comfortable right out of the box
As detailed in some reviews, the upper reinforcement supports the foot well
Its toe guard delays the process of wearing the upper, as cited by a reasonable number of commenters
Most of those who highlighted the outrigger say it prevents their foot from rolling over
Quite a lot of club and recreational players find this shoe durable and are buying extra pairs
The GameCourt is remarkably affordable with a very satisfactory performance value, as told by happy buyers
cons: Few mentioned that the GameCourt Multicourt lacks stability on the rear side, causing a bit of heel slippage

customer_reviews.title: Fake, Fake, Fake!
customer_reviews.text: The Game Court “M” is a knockoff of the Game Court, it’s plastic and cheap, Game Court original is a fine crafted tennis shoe, with intricate stitchings, fine contours and ample cushion, lasts long and looks great on the court or off, it took me years to find a shoe that I could swear by so I’m a bit peeved that I got duped...and since the price for both is the same I’d advise you buy the original.
customer_reviews.author: Aubrey-Eric Smith

customer_reviews.title: Horrible sneakers
customer_reviews.text: The sneaked look amazing in picture but it is not at all what the description says. The front of the sneakers have some kind of plastic that when it bends it looks like the sneaker is scratch and old. I bought this sneaker and after three days it look so old, they are not good for walking or anything. Please do not buy is not worth it.
customer_reviews.author: alejo748

customer_reviews.title: Great tennis shoe.
customer_reviews.text: I bought Adidas tennis shoes many times. It's best ones I ever have. But the shoe size is larger than as specified. I had to return it and replace with a smaller size. So I gave 4 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Mesos

customer_reviews.title: Loud creaking sound
customer_reviews.text: I bought a pair of these shoes previously and liked them so much that I bought another pair. Unfortunately, one of the shoes of this newest pair started to make a creaking sound every step I take after about two weeks of wearing them. It bothers me just walking around the house in these shoes. I loved the last pair but this pair must have a defect.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great pickleball shoe
customer_reviews.text: Fits well and plays with great traction and support. They wear well and withstand daily pickleball, game after game. I own 3 pairs and love the way they wrap my foot with support. Best bang for your buck.
customer_reviews.author: jtino

customer_reviews.title: Excellent hard court tennis shoes
customer_reviews.text: I have several pairs of these shoes, IT IS NOT FAKE! Come in original box,and they are exactly as the other that I have.
customer_reviews.author: Isa

customer_reviews.title: Cheap. Inconsistent. Poor fit.
customer_reviews.text: I was sent two different shoes. Same size on the tag but fit completely different. One was 1/2-1 size larger than the other. Two different colors too.
customer_reviews.author: Clay

customer_reviews.title: Okay
customer_reviews.text: These are nice running shows. They have am odd walking with something on the bottom of your shoe feeling when walkong, but the running is good
customer_reviews.author: Cameron Spradley

customer_reviews.title: what a great sneaker.
customer_reviews.text: The Adidas Gamecourt sneaker fits perfectly and has lots of support. I would buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: mike babbitt

customer_reviews.title: Good value
customer_reviews.text: These are not expensive shoes. Bought them for casual wear. They are comfortable and stylish. No issues. Good buy.
customer_reviews.author: Mike S Ohio

customer_reviews.title: Good shoe
customer_reviews.text: Like the shoe. Perfect for tennis court. Only complaint got size 11 but they fit like 11.5
customer_reviews.author: Chad Hinshaw

customer_reviews.title: Great shoe - great service.
customer_reviews.text: 2nd pair of Gamecourt shoes. Comfortable from the get go.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Exceeded Expectations
customer_reviews.text: Arrived early! Nice shoes especially for the price. Fit good.
customer_reviews.author: Erickson

customer_reviews.title: Size chart does NOT coinide with shoe!!
customer_reviews.text: ordered 8,5 . Size chart said other meassure in cm. They are tooooo big
customer_reviews.author: cynthia c.

product_meta.title: adidas Men's Gamecourt M Sneaker
